Hi. I need the following T202's graded SGC 50 or 60 only: Wallace/LaPorte (A Close Play at Home), Wallace/Pelty (A Close Play at Home), Blair/Quinn (McConnell at Bat), White/Payne(Close at the Plate), Tannehill/Lord (Held at Third), Lord/Oldring (Oldring Almost Home), Groom/Gray (Sullivan Puts Up A High One), Evans/Huggins (Sullivan Puts Up A High One). Please send scans and prices to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
Thanks!
